tags: not really bakudeku but you can be damn sure i’m implying it somewhere
summary: Y’all ever think about how in MHA universe people are probably as hellbent on digging up dirt about heroes as people in our...
body:
Y’all ever think about how in MHA universe people are probably as hellbent on digging up dirt about heroes as people in our universe are on doing that to celebrities? Because I do, sometimes. And just like, imagine:


  • Izuku and Bakugou end up being pro heroes, right? No questions about that.
  • Probably end up a team too, because let’s face it, they’re learning to work together, and there’s definitely potential there.
  • And Izuku gets to the Number One rank, obviously, but Bakugou’s definitely not far behind, maybe even Number Two. Both of them famous, loved by public, all that jazz.
  • And they have these classmates, right? Probably teachers too. From middle school, way back when. Classmates and teachers who were around them and remember these two kids growing up.
  • And they suddenly realise that NOW it matters that Bakugou used to bully Midoriya, because NOW it could be their claim to fame.
  • Number Two Hero telling the Number One to jump off a rooftop? That’s the kind of stuff that makes headlines.
  • (Forget the fact that they were basically complacent being around and doing fuck all to stop it. They’re not the ones under public scrutiny, right?)
  • So a few well-places comments on social media, a few long rants with clickbaity titles, maybe an interview or two with popular magazines, and suddenly the whole of Japan is talking about how Pro Hero Bakugou Katsuki used to be an awful person.
  • Cue the media backlash, the public outrage, the angry mobs, social media harassment by fans on both sides… The usual stuff.
  • And the fuck’s Bakugou to do? He can’t even call this slander, because none of this is a lie, and damage control has never been his strongest suit.
  • Furthermore, what’s Deku to do? Go public and say that it’s all in the past, that they’ve worked through it all, and through that – unavoidably – give some bullies an excuse to keep doing what they’re doing, and some bullied kids a reason to think that everything will be fine if they just grit their teeth and suffer through it silently? Yeah, right.
  • And all of that doesn’t even begin to cover how both of them feel. Fuck, it’s probably an issue they’ve talked through already, albeit in their own weird way, they don’t need it to be under scrutiny of the entire country all of a sudden!
  • Cue a lot of insecurity, a lot of nerves, and probably way too much yelling (which of course doesn’t do much to help the situation). Probably crying too – it’s Izuku.
  • (Also cue some hurt/comfort because pure angst hurts my soul, but I don’t know how to dig myself out of this hole)


Anyways yeah I don’t know where I’m going with this. I just think it’s a real possibility (not in the manga/anime, of course, just… in general, universe-wise), and it’s making me sad sometimes.

summary:
*Uraraka confessing feelngs to Izuku* 
Uraraka: I-I just *starts blushing* really want to... 
Izuku: Really want to do what...
body:
*Uraraka confessing feelngs to Izuku*

Uraraka: I-I just *starts blushing* really want to…

Izuku: Really want to do what Uraraka-san?

Uraraka: Really want to HANG OUT AT THE MALL! *starts laughing* C'MON DEKU, IT’LL BE FUN!

Izuku: *begins heavily blushing* URARAKA!

*Izuku hugs Uraraka but both fall in the river*

Uraraka: d-deku? Why did you do that?

Izuku: I really like yo-

Uraraka: *starts giggling* THIS FEELS SO AMAZING DEKU!

*Both Izuku and Uraraka laughing and pushing water at eachother*

Part 1/3

summary:
Ms Joke
Been watching a lot of my hero academia lately and have manage to catch up entirely. And I'm really looking forward to...
body:
Ms Joke

Been watching a lot of my hero academia lately and have manage to catch up entirely. And I’m really looking forward to season 4 in October.

Thought I might honor it by doing a fan piece about it. And who else to do a fan piece for other than my favorite character in it, Ms Joke.

Also gonna apologize for the weird upload schedule that I’ve been having. It should even out and start becoming more regular when June comes round as I should have finished college by then.
